Posts.Content: I'll soon begin sbrt radiation therapy for prostate cancer. I've been trying to practice filling my bladder & seeing how long I can hold out. 20oz of water is a lot for me & so far an hour is about it . ( 2+hrs the first time but was not long after a meal.) any suggestions or techniques for holding on longer?
Posts.Title: Full bladder

Posts.Content: Thank you, This should help. Happy b'day MM. Rob. I'm weaning myself already & hoping my practice will help. Mostly I'm just nervous about all of this & kinda get panicked.
